cause.description:
Madeleine McCann was born 4 years ago. She has one brother Sean and a sister Amelie. She lives with her family in Rothley, Leicestershire.
The disappearance of Madeleine McCann occurred on the evening of Thursday, 3 May 2007, when a then three-year-old Madeleine McCann, went missing from a holiday apartment in Praia da Luz in the Algarve in Portugal, in which she was staying with her parents. Investigation by the Portuguese Police concluded that Madeleine, who was alone in a bedroom with her two two-year-old siblings, had been abducted.
Madeleine is still missing, and it's unknown whether or not she is still alive.
If you want to donate to Madeleine's cause, go to www.findmadeleine.com
Madeleine's father, along with the International Center for Missing and Exploited Children, created a 'channel' on Youtube... http://www.youtube.com/user/DontYouForgetAboutMe
1. To secure the safe return to her family of Madeleine McCann who was abducted in Praia da Luz, Portugal on Thursday 3rd May 2007;
2. To procure that Madeleine’s abduction is thoroughly investigated and that her abductors, as well as those who played or play any part in assisting them, are identified and brought to justice; and
3. To provide support, including financial assistance, to Madeleine’s family
cause.mission: Find and bring Madeleine McCann home
cause.name: Missing Madeleine
